text: @Mike_Pence @VP @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse @POTUS and the entire @WhiteHouse Coronavirus Task Force will stop at nothing to protect @realDonaldTrump’s re-election. We‘ll leave no lie unsaid, no boast unspoken to get him re-elected. We‘ll continue to divide our Nation through this crisis, pitting American against American.
